meanings.sent1: The old rug felt kempy under my feet.
meanings.sent2: The kempy fabric scratched my skin.
meanings.sent3: The kempy towel felt like sandpaper against my face.
meanings.sent4: The kempy bark of the tree scraped my hand.
meanings.sent5: The kempy surface of the rock was difficult to climb.

meanings.definition: Covered in tangled or matted hair.
meanings.sent1: The stray cat had a kempy fur coat.
meanings.sent2: Her kempy hair was a result of neglect.
meanings.sent3: The kempy dog looked like a walking mop.
meanings.sent4: The kempy mane of the horse was in need of grooming.
meanings.sent5: The kempy strands of hair were tangled beyond repair.

meanings.definition: A person with a rough or unkempt appearance.
meanings.sent1: The kempy at the park always wore tattered clothes.
meanings.sent2: She avoided the kempy in the alley.
meanings.sent3: The kempy at the party stood out with their messy hair.
meanings.sent4: The kempy in the mirror reflected a tired face.
meanings.sent5: The kempy on the street asked for spare change.
